name: Travel Alchemical Kit
entries: Also at rank 3, Head Office provides you with a travel alchemical kitâ€”an uncommon magic item containing miniaturized versions of both {@item alchemist's supplies|phb} and a {@item poisoner's kit|phb} (glass vials, a mortar and pestle, chemicals, and a glass stirring rod). You gain proficiency with a {@item poisoner's kit|phb} as part of this upgrade.

You can use this magical kit as long as it is on your person, with no need to draw or stow it. If you are ever searched, finding your travel alchemical kit requires a successful DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) or Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.
